user.title: Connect to Rointe Nexa
user.description: Enter your Rointe Nexa app credentials. These are the same credentials you use in the Rointe mobile app.

init.title: Rointe Options
init.description: Configure options for Rointe integration (Current account: {current_email})

error.invalid_email_format: Please enter a valid email address
error.password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters long
error.invalid_credentials: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Rointe services. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This Rointe account is already configured.
